text: Forever 21 is a multinational fashion company. It is headquartered in Los Angeles, California. It was founded as the store Fashion 21 in Highland Park, Los Angeles in 1984. It sells accessories, beauty products, home goods, and clothing for women, men and children. It is currently operated by Authentic Brands Group and Simon Property Group. Category:American clothing companies Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:1984 establishments in California
title: Forever 21
